bike.description: Demo 8 FSR frame, super low center of gravity and standover with sub-seatstay actuated shock, full cartridge bearing pivots, 26" F/R wheel, 8" of travel with full chainguide and front derailleur compatibility, ISCG mount, rear derailleur protector, 26 and 24" wheel compatible with two geometry settings, 16.7" chainstay length, forged and CNC'd OS HT, Super ORE TT/DT, Demo tool

components.description: Fox DHX 4.0 coil 8.75"x2.75", adjustable rebound, ProPedal, IFP pressure
Marzocchi 888 VF2, 200mm travel, flat crowns, external rebound adjustment, integrated stem, 20mm thru axle
1 1/8" alloy upper with OS bearing, 7050 alloy lower cup with 13mm insertion
Integrated Marzocchi 888 for 31.8mm bar
Specialized Demo rise bar, 6066 alloy, 31.8mm, 6 degree upsweep, 9 degree backsweep
Specialized MTB grip, natural/black
Avid Juicy 5, hydraulic disc, 8" Polygon rotor
Avid Juicy 5, hydraulic disc, 8" Polygon rotor
Avid Juicy 5
SRAM X-9, micro cage
SRAM X-7 Trigger, 9-speed
Shimano HG50, 9-speed, 11-34t
SRAM PC-971 with Power Link
Truvativ Holzfeller with Blackspire DS-1 Guide, 170mm
36T, 4 bolt, compact 104mm pattern
Truvativ Howitzer XR, oversize sealed outboard cartridge bearing, 73mm shell
Alloy platform, 3mm pressed pins, 9/16" Cr-Mo axle
Mavic EX325 Disc, 26", 36 hole
Specialized disc, 36 hole, 20mm thru axle
Specialized disc, 36 hole bolt on axle, 135mm spacing
2.0 stainless, black, brass nipples
Specialized Chunder 26x2.3" 60 TPI, aramid bead, 2 ply, soft compound
Specialized Chunder 26x2.3" 60 TPI, aramid bead, 2 ply, soft compound
Specialized 26x2.75, schraeder valve
Specialized freeride light, 8mm hollow Cro-Mo rails with X-Brace, super light foam
Syncros Derived 2-bolt, 30.9x330mm
7050 hard annodized alloy collar with QR, 34.9mm clamp ID, black
Chain stay/seat stay protector, derailleur protector, Demo tool, reflectors, owners manual
